meanings.definition: A person licensed to practice medicine.
meanings.sent1: The doctors at the hospital work hard to help sick people.
meanings.sent2: My mom took me to the doctors when I had a fever.
meanings.sent3: The doctors in the TV show always solve mysterious cases.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a ray of sunshine, brightening the room like doctors in a hospital.
meanings.sent5: The doctors wore white coats and stethoscopes, looking very professional.

meanings.definition: To give medical treatment or care.
meanings.sent1: The nurse doctors the wound with care and bandages.
meanings.sent2: I will doctors your cold with some warm soup.
meanings.sent3: The cat doctors the injured bird back to health in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness doctors the pain in my heart, making me feel better.
meanings.sent5: The medicine doctors the illness, making the patient feel stronger.

meanings.definition: To alter or falsify in order to deceive.
meanings.sent1: The criminal tries to doctors the evidence to avoid getting caught.
meanings.sent2: She doctors her resume to make her experience look better.
meanings.sent3: The student doctors the test results to show a higher grade.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a magician's spell, doctorsing reality to fit his lies.
meanings.sent5: The spy doctors the information to mislead the enemy.
